title: [Tuts Plus] Media Queries Inside Out Video Tutorial-KTR
description:
[Tuts Plus] Media Queries Inside Out Video Tutorial-KTR
=======================================================

(RESPONSIVE WEB DESIGN)



PUBLISHER....: Tuts Plus
LANGUAGE......: ENGLISH 
AUTHOR.......: Craig Campbell
RELEASE DATE..: 2014.09.05
RUNTIME......: 2 hours



About this course::

Media queries are a powerful way to limit the scope of your CSS styles. In this course, you'll learn the magic behind media queries as you turn them inside-out and discover all that can be done with them. Craig Campbell will walk you through practical examples as he teaches you the true potential of many under-used features of CSS media queries.



Topics include:

1.Introduction
1.1Introduction
1.2What are Media Queries


2.Media Query Basics
2.1Viewport Width
2.2Simplifying Designs for Print
2.3HTML and CSS Media Queries
2.4Introduction to Media Types


3.Using Widths
3.1Max-Width Media Queries
3.2Resizing Content Based on Width
3.3Styling the Menu
3.4Creating a Menu Button
3.5Making the Menu Animate
3.6Logical Operators


4.Other Media Features
4.1Resolution Features
4.2Orientation and Aspect Ratio
4.3More Media Features
4.4Animating on Breakpoints


5.Conclusion
5.1Targeting Older Browsers
5.2The Future of Media Queries
5.3Final Thoughts
